name: Mediterranean Stuffed Chicken
author: Amy Marino
summary: Boneless breasts of chicken stuffed with a Mediterranean cheese stuffing.
ingredients: 4  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded thin
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
TO MAKE FILLING:  In a large bowl beat the cream cheese until smooth
Add the feta cheese, dill weed and garlic powder
Put a dollop of 1/4 of the filling on each breast, then roll and tie the breasts with cooking string to seal
Brush each breast with melted butter/margarine and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste
Bake uncovered in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the juices run clear
